title: Riot Cheating Me!!!!
body:
Today i got my 3 promotion games after winning alot of games, then i enter my first promo game and win it. After i come to scoreboard it shows that i already lost 1 promo game even if this was my first one.
So i tought hey maybe it's a glitch then i did go into league and saw i had a lose there too, did go to match history and no ranked lose there....So riot remove this fake lose you guys added to me!!!
Here you can see i lost no games today when my promotion games started.
[IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2me98bo.jpg[/IMG]
Here is when i go into the league it shows i got 1 lost promo game even if i today only played 1 promo game so far which i did win, also match history shows no lost game on ranked.......
[IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/radbuu.png[/IMG]

replies.body: Im guessing you are a fan of ROA

Hey,

I looked into your account and it seems you queue dodged during your promo series. When you dodge during your promos, it counts as a loss. You can find out more about how Ranked play works on our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ). 

Let me know if you have any questions.

As the rioter said you get a lose for dodging promo games.

I want to talk about your build.  Why do you build so many ROA?
Mana is completely useless on Vlad, and he needs CDR anyway. Not to mention the fact that he has no boots. I am confused as well.
